Review Name: Useless product Review Description: Don't even think of buying this AC. A 8 year old AC has more cooling effect than this. It takes around 4 hours to cool my room while the other ACs in the house take just 10-15 min though the room size is same. Trusting Flipkart with AC was my biggest mistake. Online Shopping is best for phones and other small products. If you wanna buy big appliances, do yourself a favor and visit the nearest offline store near you.
